recipe.title: Sea Bass With Citrus-Olive-Caper Sauce
ingredients: 8 sea bass fillets (about 5 ounces each), skin on
1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, divided
2 lemons, peeled and thinly sliced, segments halved
3/4 cup pitted Kalamata olives, roughly chopped
instructions: Place broiler pan as close to heating element as possible and heat 5 minutes. On a plate, coat fillets on both sides with 1 tablespoon oil. Carefully remove pan from broiler and place on stovetop. Arrange fillets on pan, skin side down; sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Broil fish 6 minutes. In a bowl, mix together lemon slices, juice, oregano, capers, olives, remaining 2 tablespoons oil and remaining 3/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Place fish on platter; top with citrus-olive-caper sauce.
